name: Hotel Ilaria

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Hotel for a week in Oct. and like the other reviewers enjoyed the excellent location, quiet ambience,good breakfasts and great "extras" that were available to all guests. We particularly liked the free bikes & complimentary drinks bar after each day exploring Lucca., it was a nice way to finish each day.
reviews.title: Cut Above the Rest

reviews.text: The free secure parking was a godsend and money saver (can be expensive in Italy).
reviews.title: A lovely hotel in lovely Lucca

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the staff were extremely helpfull and the gentleman that parks the cars went above & beyond to help us a couple of times when needed.
reviews.title: What a find!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were clean and comfortable and the large bed was much appreciated.
reviews.title: An ideal place to stay in Lucca

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed in hotels all around the world, and this one through its focus on guests comfort lives up to its 4 star rating and is a credit to the manager,( who was always in the background ensuring things went smoothly).
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice hotel-- the staff is very helpful and friendly. The hotel provides free coffee, water etc, during the day. A great extra for the traveler as you can sit and relax and enjoy the feeling of doing nothing.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Ristorante Bucca and Giglo that are part of their group are two of the better eatery's in Tuscany. Suggest however that you just ask the hotel to make a reservation for them and not include a fix price for dinner as part of the hotel reservation.
reviews.title: Great location and value in a beautiful town

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay the free bike rental and audio tour again where a very nice add to the hotel. ciao
reviews.title: I had a very nice experience with Ilaria during my stay there!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Ilaria is in a great location with easy access by car from Via Elisa Portal. Just go straight through and take last right turn! In the town parking can get very crowed but the hotel has it's own free parking area where they will have your car ready for you at the time you request. The staff speak english and are very helpful. They helped us with restaurant recommendations, train logistics, and the town sites. Our room was very clean and comfortable not small and quiet overlooking the the back patio. The bathroom Breakfast consisted of normal Italian Buffet of breads, cheeses, prosciutto, salami, fruits, juices, espresso machine. Additional items there were smoked salmon and cooked prosciutto and bacon. The hotel offers free internet (wifi), bicycles (great to get around the inner city), and maps. We really enjoyed our stay there!
reviews.title: Very good hotel to stay in Lucca.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Ilaria located inside wall city. When I landed in Lucca, I had no idea where to go and where to have food?. But Ilaria helped me to find food, find very nice places for the site seing even though my main purpose was not to visit some places.
reviews.title: Well placed and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately we only had arranged to stay at this charming little hotel for one night. It is right outside a main entrance to the old city, you can park your car and forget it. The rooms, though small as is the european standard are spotless and modern. Beds comfortable, fridge, hair dryer, modern bathrooms. The front desk is welcoming and cheerful. The furnished breakfast is fresh and tasty in a cheery dining room that adjoins an outdoor terrace. There is a complimentary snack bar in the lobby which features juice, tea, coffee, sweet rolls, etc., available from 10 AM to 7 PM. You can easily walk the entire old city. The location is somewhat quiet despite a local street right outside the window. They park your car on the hotel grounds. We wish we could have stayed longer
reviews.title: Little gem in a perfect location
A comfortable "base camp" for our joyful experiences of Tuscany
reviews.text: Three Norwegian couples/old friends wanted to experience and enjoy Tuscany for a week in april 2011. We can't give credit to Hotel Ilaria for all the great historic impressions, the artistic masterpieces, the hospitality and all the wonderful food and wine that we experienced during this week. However, the hotel and it's staff did organize our pleasant base camp and offered us the opportunity of enjoying it all, completely, with no disappointments whatsoever during this week.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We want to express our gratitude to the smiling staff for their help and service minded attitude. You made our wonderful breakfast, you succeeded in keeping our rooms civilized, you parked our big car when we returned tired after a long day, you made reservations and guided us, allways with a smile. Thank you.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel within the walls

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the adjacent Residenza dell'Alba, 1/2 block from the main hotel. We had a very large room that was clean and comfortable. A large bath. The hotel provides an excellent breakfast. They also have free use of bicycles to tour the city. Anything of interest in Lucca is within the walls and is within walking distance. It was very easy to catch a train from Lucca to visit Cinque Terra for the day.
reviews.title: Good hotel, beautiful town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my husband stayed here for 3 nights, during April.
reviews.title: Great Location and very helpful staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I had reserved a superior room but actually wound up staying in the annex. That was a treat because the annex had been converted from a very old stone prison into a set of hotel rooms. The room was really a beautiful suite, very nicely furnished and decorated. A portion of the old stone wall with iron bars had been preserved. Whoever had designed the remodel had an incredible sense of style because they had melded the historic with the new.
reviews.title: A very nice place to stay in Lucca

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At the front desk, I asked Fabrizio about the location of Rusticanella for lunch. He told me where it was located and politely mentioned that it served very simple food. I think he didn't want to offend me because Rusticanella is a very ordinary place for lunch that I would recommend avoiding. You can do much better in Lucca.
reviews.title: Everything Just Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One morning, we got up very late and went to the breakfast room. Almost everything had been put away but one of the kitchen staff was so friendly and helpful, she started bringing out food for us from the kitchen.
reviews.title: Best breakfast of our entire trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend Hotel Ilaria.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel within the walls of Lucca - beautiful hotel

reviews.text: we couldn't have asked for a better start to out holiday in Tuscany. From the moment we entered the hotel, the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great Beginning to our trip to Tuscany

description: Hotel Ilaria and the Residenza dell'Alba are situated in the center of Lucca, within the renaissance walls. Approaching to a medieval door and overlooking on a secular park, under a majestic plane tree, you will enjoy a spectacular architectonic scenery. Our hotel residenza dell'alba are the ideal place for a moment of charme or for a business meeting in a space of light and green designed by the history.
